means: <美>未决定的，有争议的，有疑问的
提出…供讨论( moot的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Plans have been mooted for a 450,000-strong Ukrai-nian army.
sentence.Network_cn: 建立一支拥有45万名士兵的乌克兰军队的计划被提出供讨论。

sentence.Network_en: When the theatre idea was first mooted I had my doubts.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一次讨论剧院设想时，我就表示怀疑。

sentence.Network_en: The is sue was mooted on the Senate floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 该问题在参院被提出讨论.

list.abs: intensify college moot court teaching and cultivate practical talented persons利用高校模拟法庭培养实用型法律人才
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... moose 驼鹿 moot court 假设法庭 moot 大会.
大四签约前，你知道这些么？ ... 政法论坛 Political and Legal Forum 模仿法庭 Moot Court 演讲竞赛 Speech Competition.
新概念英语第四册笔记大全 - 冬日恋歌的日志... ... thermodynamics 热力学 moot point 有争议的 run-down 破旧的.
Battle of the Exes 电影：旧日夫妻之战_教育... ... modifier 修饰语 moot point 争论点 intrepid 无畏的.

entry.tran: 提出(计划、主意或主题)供讨论
entry.def: If a plan, idea, or subject is mooted, it is suggested or introduced for discussion.

example.ex: Plans have been mooted for a 450,000-strong Ukrainian army...
example.tran: 建立一支拥有45万名士兵的乌克兰军队的计划被提出供讨论。

example.ex: When the theatre idea was first mooted I had my doubts.
example.tran: 第一次讨论剧院设想时，我就表示怀疑。

entry.tran: 有争议的;尚未达成一致的;未决的
entry.def: If something is a moot point or question, people cannot agree about it.

example.ex: How long he'll be able to do so is a moot point.
example.tran: 不知道他还能这样做多久。

auth_sentence.content: Other reforms have been mooted, but then withdrawn.
